name: Silverstein Tree Trunk Table - Natural
description: You asked, we answered. After receiving numerous requests to create more oval-shaped dining tables, we designed the Silverstein. Seating ten, the Silverstein's clear glass top contrasts beautifully with its textured resin base. It's perfect for summer dining – be that by a pool, on a terrace or in the middle of a country garden – but it makes as big of a statement when styled indoors.
